subject: Problem with vam motor
description_text:
My order Number is SSN2484
I ordered 3 vam motors and it arrived few days ago. One of the motors started doing loud noises and getting hotter than the others. I think its something wrong with it. Can i have a replacement or something? Thanks in advance

conversations.body_text: Hi Adrià Zayas,  Please provide your contact name, address, and phone number so that we can arrange a replacement for you. Alternatively, you may open the unit and send us photos, which will help us check and identify the specific fault.

Hi
Name: Adria Zayas Fandos
Address: Escorial 8, 4to 2da Escalera B. 08025 Barcelona, Spain.
Phone Number: 655091951
On the other hand, i would gladly open the device and take photos, but I dont have the right tool for it.
